item.title: How do i make command that gives you xp(only for admin lvl 3)
item.dc:creator: @tennessean tennessean
item.description:
@tennessean wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“givexp”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);

addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);

addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
}
